official_title: A bill to amend medicare and medicaid provisions as they relate to rural health care facilities.

summary.text: Amends Title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include within the meaning of the term "hospital" under such Title, rural health facilities of 50 beds or less. Sets forth exceptions to staffing, health, and safety requirements set forth for hospitals in the definition of such term.

titles.title: A bill to amend medicare and medicaid provisions as they relate to rural health care facilities.
